attributes.comment:
Hello,

My name is Joelle Holmquist. My husband and I adopted our daughter from China
in November 2006. Because the I-171-H expires after 18 months, we had to refile
and pay almost $800 extra. We ended up not even needing it because we got
back from China 7 days before our first I-171-H expired.

I feel that the increase in fees for international adoption are unnecessary. It is
unfair to increase these fees when other fees are already so high for international
adoption. Please keep the rates at the current amount. Help more children be
united with their parents by keeping these fees low.

Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Joelle Holmquist
